alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 11:19AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Sevier, Piute, Garfield, Kane and Iron Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt snowpack, causing elevated flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding will continue. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until further notice. Flows may begin to decrease over this coming weekend. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1046 cfs), minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 4.12 feet (1174 CFS). - Forecast...The river will oscillate between minor and moderate flood stage with daily peaks occurring each morning. While the river is currently not forecast to return to moderate flood stage, a combination of warmer than forecast temperatures or more rainfall than currently forecast could briefly return flows to to moderate flood stage. - Minor flood stage is 3.9 feet (1046 cfs). Moderate flood stage is 4.3 feet (1353 cfs). &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Avoid walking near the riverbanks as the flow of the water is high cold and fast. Keep children and pets away from the riverbank. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
